name: Reader of the Codex of War

system.description:
You are an eldritch warrior-scholar, and your learnedness is reflected in your effectiveness on the battlefield. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Book of Shadows can transform from a regular book to a battle book. Switching between forms takes a bonus action. The contents are unaltered by the transformation.
  • You can always use scrolls with spells from the weaponry school, regardless of whether you could normally cast the spell on them or not.
  • Spells from the weaponry school require 1 fewer artifact charges or spell points to cast (cost cannot be reduced below a minimum of 1 point).
  • You gain a pool of battlefield intuition charges, which begins empty. When you score a critical hit on an attack, you gain a battlefield intuition charge. If you miss with a weapon attack, you can use your reaction to spend a battlefield intuition charge to gain a bonus of 1d4 on the attack roll, potentially turning the miss into a hit. You can only have a number of intuition charges equal to your proficiency bonus at any given time, and your pool resets to zero when you begin a rest.
system.prerequisite: Pactbound Custodian feat, Pact of the Tome, Bonded Artifact is a Weapon of Power
